name: A Good Lead
description: The Dosi--brutal traders feared even by the Ferengi--claim to have a solution for the temporal anomaly crisis. It can be yours... for the right price. Investigate these claims and prepare to make the deal of a lifetime.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Zyree, Garak, Tucker, Tribble Quark, or Survivalists will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Zyree, Garak, Tucker, Tribble Quark, or Survivalists
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Bashir
featured_crew.flavor: A participant in the Klingon ritual of kal’Hyah, Bashir’s endurance is tested through the trials of deprivation, blood, pain, sacrifice, anguish and death.

featured_crew.name: Garak
featured_crew.flavor: Bribed by Sisko, Garak joins O’Brien’s scavenging operation on the booby-trapped Cardassian station, the Empok Nor.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Persis
rewards.flavor: A human augment, Persis developed a strong attachment to Arik Soong, who she viewed as her father.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Bashir
rewards.flavor: A participant in the Klingon ritual of kal’Hyah, Bashir’s endurance is tested through the trials of deprivation, blood, pain, sacrifice, anguish and death.

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

adventures.name: Window Shopping
adventures.description: Inquire about other deals with the Dosi to gather intel.

adventures.name: Blips and Spikes
adventures.description: Scan Dosi space for any unknown elements.

adventures.name: Smoke, Then Fire
adventures.description: Study Dosi technologies and products for advancements.

adventures.name: Dosi Dossier
adventures.description: An intel report on the Dosi's supposed solution.

rewards.name: A Good Lead
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Garak
rewards.flavor: Bribed by Sisko, Garak joins O’Brien’s scavenging operation on the booby-trapped Cardassian station, the Empok Nor.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: The Terran Empire has relics of a different universe.
The venerable Klingon Empire is older than most.
The Borg have assimilated the rarest of species.

screens.text: "I've got a lead. The Dosi might just have a solution to this mess. They've been mum on the details, but that just shows you they're good at doing business."
"I might just have a solution, too. Or a three-tailed taspar. You don't know because I won't show you. Wasn't there a fellow who had a name for this situation? Schrodinger, I think it was?"
"I'm not saying we hand over all our latinum blindly. I'm saying we assume the best, but prepare for the worst. Let's sniff around, see if we can't find some proof that this cat's really alive."
